**The Wondrous Scripture of the Three Nines and Jade Essence from the Supreme Cavern of Perfection**

**Scripture Title:** *The Wondrous Scripture of the Three Nines and Jade Essence from the Supreme Cavern of Perfection*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition.

**The Wondrous Oral Formula of the Three Nines and Jade Essence**

On the auspicious celestial stem day of the first year of the *shangyuan* era, at the hour of the northern quadrant, when the Three Origins aligned in radiance and the Nine Emperors returned to perfection, the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One and the Three Heavens’ Jade Lads ascended the Jade Pavilion of the Lofty Heights, the Purple Void Heaven. There, the *Three Nines Oral Formula* was revealed, unlocking the numinous barrier, and the *Jade Essence True Formula* was bestowed—governing destiny for eternal preservation. Its revelation illuminated the distant expanse, its clarity as pure as the rustling wind, its jade tones resounding through the void, its jasper melodies soaring beyond the heavens. Fragrant winds stirred without cease, and wisdom’s chant echoed into the farthest reaches. Its fragrance suffused the depths of the visage, its qi outstripped the divine gales. The Jade Tablet commanded all, and the myriad immortals came to pay homage. This was the wondrous transformation of primordial mystery, enduring through ten thousand kalpas without decay. The true formula was recorded to bequeath to the worthy, testing the sincerity of those who seek with diligence.

Should one’s golden name be *Eastern Radiance* and one’s verdant appellation *Purple Court*, upon receiving this wondrous scripture, one ascends to the Jade Clarity Heaven. The Three Passes unlock their mechanism, the Nine Portals receive the numinous, and the visage assumes a golden countenance. The Five Viscera flourish in splendor, the golden perfection is felt in harmony, and the boundless is illuminated with clarity. The divine candle shines in hidden radiance, the treasure-light is born in the night. Molten gold is cast in exchange, and the flaming bells blaze forth. With a whistle, the command is instantly fulfilled, and the divine soldiers are marshaled. The Three Origins journey to the chamber, descending in a jade-green chariot. Riding the void, soaring through emptiness, one ascends to the Supreme Clarity.

The Most Exalted Azure Lad said: The *Three Nines Oral Formula* originates from the incantations of the Nine Emperors and the Three Perfected, governing qi to prolong the years and unlocking the numinous barrier to freshen the Five Viscera.

You possess jade bones and have beheld this text. Receive it in secret, swear a luminous oath, and pledge your faith to the Nine Heavens. Cultivate this Dao in seclusion. Guard against reckless transmission; to reveal it to the unworthy is to invite calamity upon yourself—not merely the wind’s blade, but misfortune extending to the Seven Mysteries. Be vigilant in celestial law, seeking the true Dao. After nine years of unwavering practice, you shall attain the rank of Supreme Immortal.

The formula was transmitted simultaneously by the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One and the Three Heavens’ Jade Lads to the Supreme Thearch, the Celestial Thearch, and the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity. The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Lord of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen; the Celestial Thearch transmitted it to the Queen Mother of the West; the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Sacred Lord of the Golden Portal. The Sacred Lord of the Golden Portal transmitted it to the Most Exalted Azure Lad, who in turn transmitted it to the Lord of the Western City, entrusting it to later disciples destined to become Perfected. The lineage of transmission, bound by true qi, traces back to the imperial scripture. By the time of the Lord of the Western City, over seven thousand kalpas had passed. Thereafter, the Lord of the Western City sealed the numinous text within the jade chamber of the western cavern of Mount Wangwu, where the officials of the Plain Spirit attended to its incense and guarded its scripture.

This Dao is profoundly wondrous and not disseminated in the world. Should one of mysterious destiny encounter this text, the myriad immortals shall come to pay homage, and celestial officials shall guard one’s person. Through diligent practice and arduous contemplation, one shall ascend at dawn.

For those who receive the wondrous chapters of the Three Treasures of the Supreme Clarity’s Dao and Virtue, practicing the Way of pacing the void to ascend the mystery, yet do not first release the Five Viscera and open the hidden barriers, their myriad qi will not be stabilized, and their true numen will not rejoice. Their diligent efforts shall be in vain, and they shall never attain immortality.

Now, this *Jade Formula*, the wondrous words of the Supreme Thearch, is transmitted to later disciples. Guard it in secrecy and revere the true. Beware of careless transmission, lest calamity befall you.

On the day of your life-destiny, bathe and enter the chamber. Face east, knock your teeth nine times, and with eyes closed, visualize the Nine Numinous Perfected of the Eastern Azure Thearch and Lesser Yang, whose taboo name is *Jushangsheng*. He is nine inches tall, wears a Nine Origins crown, and is clad in a single-layered azure flying skirt. In his hand, he holds a jade tablet of azure essence, riding a flying chariot of azure clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Azure Cassia. They descend from the Palace of Celestial Clarity and Yang. Visualize the azure cloud crown covering your body.

Imagine the Nine Numinous Perfected riding the cloud-qi into your body, settling and stabilizing your liver. Then, call thrice upon the Nine Numinous Perfected of Lesser Yang, *Jushangsheng*, beseeching him to bestow the five essences of azure mushrooms to nourish your body. Then, taste thrice and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Vast and numinous Azure Origin, Master of Lesser Yang,
Nine qi return to the liver, pacifying the po soul.
The hidden palace knots in splendor, the viscera’s interior gleams bright.
Refine the countenance, strengthen the body, reverse white to azure.
The divine transformation arises within, the radiance ascends to the Purple Court.
Should any dare transgress, be shattered by the flaming bells.
Inscribed in the Jade Record of the Supreme Thearch, the name is recorded in the Grand Clarity."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing nine times.

Face due south, close your eyes, and knock your teeth three times. Visualize the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang of the Southern Crimson Thearch, whose taboo name is *Rongshangsheng*. He is three inches tall, wears a *Jinxian* crown, and is clad in a robe of woven patterns. In his hand, he holds a vermilion jade tablet, riding a flying chariot of crimson clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Crimson Cassia. They descend from the Palace of the Orchid Terrace. Visualize the crimson cloud chariot covering your body.

Imagine the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang riding the cloud-qi into your body, settling and stabilizing your heart. Then, call thrice upon the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang, *Rongshangsheng*, beseeching him to bestow the jade essence of cinnabar mushrooms to nourish your body. Then, taste thrice and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Crimson Court of scarlet clouds, above dwell the exalted Perfected.
Three qi return to the heart, this is my cinnabar origin.
Exalt my pure body, ascend directly to make report.
The heart is stabilized, the spirit is tranquil, the Nine Numinous seal the barrier.
Golden perfection shines within, purple mist knots into clouds.
Inscribed in the verdant script of the Grand Tenuity, the name is written as divine immortal.
Soaring to the Supreme Clarity, I pay homage to the Imperial Honored One."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing three times.

Face due west, close your eyes, and knock your teeth seven times. Visualize the Plain Numinous Perfected of the Western White Thearch and Lesser Yin, whose taboo name is *Rumingzi*. He is seven inches tall, wears a dark jade crown, and is clad in a robe of plain brocade. In his hand, he holds a plain jade tablet, riding a flying chariot of white clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Plain Spirit. They descend from the Palace of the Celestial August Hall. Visualize the plain cloud crown covering your body.

Visualize the Plain Numinous Perfected riding clouds and qi into my body, settling and stabilizing within my chest. Then call three times upon the Lesser Yin Plain Numinous Perfected *Rumingzi*, beseeching him to bestow the great zhi-fungus and jade essence to nourish my body. Then savor three times and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Plain Origin, cavernous emptiness,
Celestial Perfected’s divine abode.
Seven qi guard the chest,
Dwelling with the spirit as one.
Preserve and refine the five viscera,
Containing blossoms and lustrous zhi.
Limpid sincerity, luminous stone,
Roaming and ascending the mysterious void.
White jade, golden script,
Nine Emperors’ true writ.
Let me become a flying immortal,
Shedding the name of death.
Roam the Three Caverns of Clarity,
Freely as my heart desires."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing seven times.

Face due north, close your eyes, and knock your teeth five times. Visualize the Northern Black Thearch’s Greater Yin Mysterious Numinous Perfected, whose taboo name is *Mingxuanmo*. He is five inches tall, wears a dark crown, and is clad in a robe of dark cloud brocade. In his hand, he holds a tablet of mysterious essence jade, riding a flying chariot of dark clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Greater Mystery. They descend from the Palace of the Celestial Mysterious Yin Jade Void. Visualize the dark cloud crown covering your body.

Visualize the Greater Yin Mysterious Numinous Perfected riding clouds into my body, settling and stabilizing within my kidneys. Then call three times upon the Greater Yin Mysterious Numinous Perfected *Mingxuanmo*, beseeching him to bestow the dark zhi-fungus and jade essence to nourish my body. Then savor three times and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Mysterious Origin of the Northern Ultimate,
Supreme Numinous Pivot.
Five qi defend the kidneys,
Tortoise and jade interlock.
Precious blossoms weave the network,
The stomach-viscus shines forth.
The spirit’s name is Jade Terrace,
Years equal the Two Modes.
Supreme August Thearch of High Antiquity,
Steadfast and unconfused.
Command the Six Jia,
Summon the Eight Might.
Ride the three dragons’ chariot aloft,
Transcending to ascend and fly.
Inhaling and exhaling divine zhi,
Enduring through kalpas without decline."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing five times.

Face the direction of your natal destiny, close your eyes, and knock your teeth twelve times. Visualize the Central Yellow Thearch’s Prime Origin Threefold Numinous Perfected, whose taboo name is *Yuanhua*. He is one inch and two fen tall, wears a crown of yellow dawn jade, and is clad in a flying skirt of yellow brocade. In his hand, he holds a tablet of yellow essence jade, riding a flying chariot of yellow clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Central Yellow Thearch. They descend from the Palace of the Celestial Jade Chamber. Visualize the yellow cloud covering your crown.

Visualize the Threefold Numinous Perfected riding clouds into my body, settling and stabilizing within my spleen. Then call three times upon the Prime Origin Threefold Numinous Perfected *Yuanhua*, beseeching him to bestow the yellow essence jade zhi to nourish my body. Then savor three times and swallow three times. Look upward and recant the incantation:

*"Yellow Origin, Central Thearch,
Spirit of my natal destiny.
One qi attends the spleen,
Enabling me to attain the true.
The solid viscus engenders blossoms,
Weaving the network of purple dawn.
Transforming the countenance through refinement,
Preserving life and prolonging years.
Inclining toward things yet unshaken,
A thousand spirits come to serve.
The Elder Lord’s mysterious register,
Inscribes the name of divine immortal.
Long life and enduring vision,
Coexisting with heaven."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing twelve times.

Return to face the east, close your eyes, and knock your teeth thirty-six times. Visualize the Five Qi Jade Clarity High August Supreme Treasure Perfected, whose taboo name is *Taixu*. He is three inches tall, wears a crown of jade dawn, and is clad in a seamless robe of five colors. In his left hand, he holds the essence of the sun; in his right, the light of the moon. He stabilizes my upper mansion, the Muddy Pellet Palace.

Call three times upon the Supreme Treasure Perfected *Taixu*, beseeching him to bestow the flowing essence of the five qi to refine and irrigate my body. Then savor five times and swallow five times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"High August Perfected Sovereign,
Five Thearchs’ great numen.
Preserve my Muddy Pellet,
Mysteriously reflecting the five forms.
Three luminaries shine brightly,
Sun and moon penetratingly clear.
Flying clouds, flowing rosy clouds,
Infusing and irrigating jade essence.
Refining the countenance, preserving the po,
Spirit and soul spontaneously born.
A thousand transformations, myriad changes,
Ascending into the Purple Court."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing five times.

When the incantations for the five directions are complete, rub your palms together and wipe your face and eyes.

After five years of such practice, your face and hair will take on a golden countenance, the five viscera will blossom with splendor, the jade viscus will preserve qi, and the Dao of divine immortality will be achieved. The Three Palaces will feel harmonious and unobstructed, the true numina will manifest their forms, and you will ride the void and ascend into emptiness, ascending to heaven in broad daylight. This depends solely on secret cultivation; guard it carefully and do not transmit it lightly.

**Method of Presenting Memorials on the Eight Nodal Days**

For those who cultivate the above method, recite the Dao ten thousand times, hoping to attain numinosity and realize the divine, seeking to become a divine immortal: on the days of the eight nodes, present a memorial to the numinous mountain of your natal destiny, submitting it to the Jade Clarity. After three years without fail, your name will be inscribed in the Azure Palace, your memorial tied to the Jade August One, with jade blossoms as attendants and golden dawn to receive you.

This is the true formula of Jade Clarity, the precious scripture of the Thearch-Lord. Whoever obtains this formula will ascend as an immortal in a calculated number of days. To recklessly divulge the divine text is to invite judgment upon the Nine Mysteries: the body will perish, the form will be destroyed, and one will be eternally sealed in the River Source. This depends solely on secret cultivation; the Dao does not speak falsely.

On the day of the Summer Solstice, at the peak of your natal destiny mountain, face due south, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:

*"Mysterious essence, yang brightness,
Prime Origin Thearch’s numen.
Four scenes, eight qi,
Weaving the warp and weft of heaven’s scripture.
White Origin sheds death,
Flourishing Hero infuses life.
Present the memorial to the numinous mountain,
Recorded and heard in Jade Clarity.
High August Thearch,
Inscribe the true name of the first celestial stem.
Awaiting the imperial audience,
Body to pay homage in the Purple Court.
The Three Offices and Nine Bureaus,
None will disobey or fail to heed."*

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial atop a sheer cliff.

On the day of the Autumnal Equinox, at the peak, face due west, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:

*"Flowing flames, fourfold radiance,
Flying scenes illuminate the dawn.
Eight qi intermingle and shine,
Falling together with heaven’s scripture.
Prime Origin announces the morning,
Responding above to the Thearch’s numen.
Present the memorial to the numinous mountain,
Eastern Florescence records the name.
Long preserve the mysterious chamber,
Feasting in the Purple Court.
The Three Palaces and Nine Bureaus,
List me among the long-lived.
Coexisting with heaven,
Eternally preserving yellow tranquility."*

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial. On the day of the Autumnal Equinox, at the peak, face due west, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:

At the Minor Yin’s announcement of the mandate,
The Eight Ways unfold,
The Two Images turn in harmony,
Weaving the celestial beams.
The Prime Origin reins in rectitude,
Aligning with the four quarters.
Present the memorial to the Mysterious Peak,
That it may ascend to the Jade Capital’s summit,
To the Highest Thearch and Lofty Honored One.
Record the name in the Hall of No-Blossoms,
The Three Offices strike off death,
The Nine Bureaus prosper in accord.
From this moment forth,
The Three Realms’ overseers shall welcome me,
Riding the void, steering the mists,
Soaring through the Great Empyrean.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

On the day of the Beginning of Winter, at the peak, face northwest, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:
Dark Yin governs the dawn,
The Four Movements revolve heaven,
Eight qi intermingle and traverse,
Three and Five cycle in return.
The Thearch announces the mandate,
Mother Auspice inaugurates the morning.
Present the name to the Azure Palace,
To be enrolled as an imperial minister above,
Receiving heaven’s decree and obeying the mandate,
Paying homage to the Jade Dawn.
Strike off death in the Northern Feng,
Record the name in the Southern Palace.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

On the day of the Winter Solstice, at the peak, face north, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:
Yin essence spurs qi,
The northern dawn rides the dark,
The Two Radiances intertwine,
Traversing the celestial scripture.
The Nine Thearchs move in unison,
Illuminating the true name.
Present the memorial to ascend,
Record the covenant in the Jade Court.
The Five Peaks and Three Offices
All affirm my life,
Sharing the sun’s radiance,
Sharing heaven’s tranquility.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Kneel and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

On the day of the Beginning of Spring, at the peak, face northeast, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:
Yang essence heralds the beginning,
Mysterious qi pierces the dawn,
The Two Movements intermingle and shine,
Three and Five revert to truth.
The Thearch bears a mandate,
Announcing to me the numinous scripture.
Submit the memorial to the Numinous Peak,
Eternally preserving the flying immortal.
The Three Offices and Nine Bureaus
Pass me through the river sources,
My name enrolled in the imperial register,
Ever to be a jade guest.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

On the day of the Spring Equinox, at the peak, face east, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:
Heaven clears, qi spreads,
Vast purity flows azure,
Riding the firm to govern the dawn,
Revolving through the Five Stars.
The Yellow Register illumines the soul,
Eastern Florescence preserves life.
Long enjoy the boundless,
For aeons commencing longevity.
Present the memorial to the Jade Gate,
The Northern Thearch records the name,
Wandering through the Mysterious Terrace,
Floating radiance in the Purple Clarity.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

In the month of the Beginning of Summer, at the peak, face southeast, knock your teeth thirty-two times, and look upward to softly recite the incantation:
Eight qi bind and interlace,
Ordering positions to pity heaven,
Five revolutions, seven turns,
Transformations suddenly heard.
Thrice refined, nine times tested,
Altering countenance and renewing years,
Crossing radiance without delay,
Eternally preserving the highest immortal.

Conclude by swallowing qi nine times. Then face north, kneel, and read the memorial, reciting the incantation as per the subsequent method before burying the memorial.

The Highest Purple Void Jade Thearch, Great Cavern Three Radiance Disciple, Master of the Sacred Peak, Wang of such-and-such a district, aged so-and-so, styled such-and-such, born in such-and-such a month, having undergone the Three Trials, is to serve as an imperial minister. Respectfully petition the true spirits of the Five Peaks and numinous mountains, the Three Offices, Nine Bureaus, and Twelve River Sources to record my mysterious name and submit it to the Jade Clarity above.

Inscribe this in vermilion on a silver slip, face north to read the slip, then bury it beneath the Mysterious Crag, ensuring no one learns of it.

Face north, bow twice, kneel, and read the memorial to its conclusion. Then knock your teeth nine times and softly recite the incantation:
Prime Origin Thearch Sovereign,
Highest Jade Perfected,
Golden Immortal Father and Mother,
Jade Florescence and Purple Dawn,
Overseers of the myriad qi,
Supervisors of the perfected and leaders of immortals,
Examiners of the Azure Palace,
Numinous spirits bearing the talismanic mandate,
Inspectors of the registers and records,
Presenting them before the Thearch,
Respectfully petition the Nine Bureaus,
The Three Offices and River Sources,
To pass my name into the Jade Register,
Eternally preserving long life.

Conclude and bury the memorial.

These are the plain words and wondrous secrets of the Thearch Lord, transmitted only to those of bone predestined for immortality. At each seasonal node, perform the above method, ensuring that over three years, twenty-four memorial slips are submitted to the numinous peaks. Then the True Thearch shall inscribe the name, and the Thearch shall grant twelve jade boys and twelve jade maidens. To lightly divulge this precious secret is to invite the annihilation of oneself and one’s descendants. Be clear and cautious in the mysterious statutes, guarding and practicing them in secret.

**Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method**

**Jade Essence Oral Instructions:**
Should you wish to conceal and study,
Purify and fast upon the mountains.
On a *ren* or *gui* day,
Carve a green stone and inscribe in black the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture,
Burying it in the east of your dwelling.
At the moment of burial, face east, knock your teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
Green Humiliation, Green Humiliation,
Sacred Peak of Mount Tai,
Nine qi’s numinous essence,
Long forests and deep darkness,
Three Fields of indigo waves,
Four legs and six eyes,
Abodes of the highest perfected,
Universally proclaimed to the four domains.
The thousand spirits and myriad essences,
None dare disobey.
The Jade Thearch bears a mandate,
Those who violate shall be punished by execution.

Conclude and bury the stone nine feet deep.

This is the Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method. The text is as follows:
The Heavenly Thearch Lord received the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One, inscribed in black on green stone to be buried in the east of the dwelling peak, subduing the myriad demons and summoning perfected immortals and true persons to appear, with jade maidens guarding the form. Guard this secret and do not transmit it.

**Jade Essence Oral Instructions:**
On a *jia* or *yi* day,
Carve a red stone and inscribe in blue-green the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture,
Burying it in the south of the dwelling peak.
At the moment of burial, face south, knock your teeth nine times, and recite the incantation:
Vermilion Yang essence,
Southern Huo’s myriad spirits,
Lush and verdant, nurturing the whirlwind,
Riding the dark to enter the obscure,
The Thearch’s palace holds its position,
Floating life in yellow tranquility.
From heaven downward,
None dare disobey.
Those who violate shall be executed,
Those who offend shall be punished.

Conclude and bury the stone nine feet deep.

This is the Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method. The text is as follows:
The Heavenly Thearch Lord received the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One, inscribed in blue-green on red stone to be buried in the south of the dwelling peak, subduing the myriad demons and summoning perfected immortals and true persons to appear, with jade maidens guarding the form. Attain the Jade Essence True Instructions, ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Guard this secret and do not transmit it.

The Jade Essence Instructions state: On a *wu-ji* day, carve white stone and inscribe the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture in yellow, to be buried in the west of the dwelling peak. At the moment of burial, face west and knock the teeth nine times, reciting the incantation:

*"White radiance weaves the net,
Pristine spirits dwell in the dark expanse,
The myriad essences of the Western Peak,
Riding qi upon surging waves,
The Primordial Beginning issues the decree,
Commanding the Three Florets,
The Four Quarters and Eight Qi,
All become my domain.
Those who violate shall be beheaded,
Those who offend shall be punished."*

Conclude and bury the stone nine feet deep.

This is the Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method. The text is as follows:
The Heavenly Thearch Lord received the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One, inscribed in yellow on white stone to be buried in the west of the dwelling peak, subduing the myriad demons and summoning perfected immortals and true persons to appear, with jade maidens guarding the body. The Jade Scripture shall illuminate itself, and one shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Guard this secret and do not transmit it.

The Jade Essence Instructions state: On a *geng-xin* day, carve black stone and inscribe the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture in white, to be buried in the north of the dwelling peak. At the moment of burial, face north and knock the teeth nine times, reciting the incantation:

*"The Northern Peak of Hengshan,
Essence of the Star of Dawn,
Dark shade and black specks,
Harmonizing qi to release numinous power,
The Thearch issues the decree,
The Jade Scripture governs life,
The Three Paths display their might,
Their dominion is not trifling.
All should obey the command,
Restore your true form."*

Conclude and bury the stone nine feet deep.

This is the Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method. The text is as follows:
The Heavenly Thearch Lord received the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One, inscribed in white on black stone to be buried in the north of the dwelling peak, subduing the myriad demons and summoning perfected immortals and true persons to appear, with jade maidens guarding the form. The true instructions shall illuminate themselves, and one shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Hold this secret and do not transmit it.

The Jade Essence Instructions state: On a *bing-ding* day, carve yellow stone and inscribe the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture in red, to be buried at the center of the dwelling peak. At the moment of burial, face your life-destiny direction and knock the teeth nine times, reciting the incantation:

*"Yellow qi and dark Song Peak,
Governing the Five Directions,
Riding the primordial destiny above,
Subduing the demon kings,
A thousand soldiers and a hundred aides,
Conspire with demons in malice,
The One Thearch’s numinous power,
Receives the mandate of the Nine Yangs,
The Primordial Beginning’s Jade Scripture,
Governs the spirits of the Central Palace."*

Conclude and bury the stone nine feet deep.

This is the Thearch Lord’s Jade Scripture: Divine Ruling Upper Method. The text is as follows:
The Heavenly Thearch Lord received the Nine Heavens’ Jade Scripture from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One, inscribed in red on yellow stone to be buried at the center of the dwelling peak, subduing the myriad demons and summoning perfected immortals and true persons to appear, with jade maidens guarding the body. The true instructions shall illuminate themselves, and one shall ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Guard this secret and do not transmit it.

The above are the Jade Essence Peak-Governing Upper Methods, received by the Thearch Lord from the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One as oral instructions. According to the statutes of the Perfected and Mysterious, transmission may only be granted to those with the bone-sign of destined immortality after seven hundred years. Those without jade names must not recklessly divulge it. To lightly reveal the divine scripture is to invite retribution upon seven generations of ancestors and calamity upon one’s descendants. The recipient must be cautious, keeping it secret and upholding its practice.

For the transmission of true instructions and essential plain-language teachings, in accordance with the luminous statutes, one must present a golden fish, a jade dragon, forty feet of blue silk, nine pairs of golden buttons, a hundred feet of life-destiny silk, and swear an oath of fidelity to the Nine Heavens. Proclaim the covenant before all heavens, perform purification rites in a secluded chamber, and only then may the transmission proceed. To break the oath or violate the trust incurs the same punishment from the ghostly officials upon both master and disciple. Each party must be meticulous in their conduct.

*Washen Supreme Three-Nine Plain-Speech Jade Essence True Instructions* concludes.

chunks.original_text: 洞真太上三九素语玉精真诀 经名：洞真太上三九素语玉精。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系早期上清派重要经典。 一卷底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部 洞真太上三九素语玉精真诀 三九素语玉精真诀 九天丈人、三天玉童，以上始元年天甲吉辰，时加北维，移度停轩，三元齐景，九帝回真，登高上玉馆，紫虚之天，三九素语，披解灵关，玉精真诀，理命长存，开究辽朗，清畅萧条，玉音秀虚，琼音逸霄，香风激无，慧唱遐寥，流芳深颐，气冠神飙，玉检总御，万仙来朝，斯玄古之妙化，经万劫而不雕，撰真诀以遗观，试来心於懃翘。 若金名东华，绿字紫庭，得受妙篇，位登玉清，三关启机，九户受灵，面登金容，五藏华荣，金真感畅，豁落洞明，神烛潜照，宝光夜生，流金交掷，焕落火铃，啸命立到，驱策神兵，三元诣房，降致绿軿，乘空驾虚，飞腾上清。 上相青童君曰：三九素语，出於九帝三真命咒之辞，理气停年，开解灵关，五藏华鲜。 子有玉骨，得见此文，密告明誓，誓信九天，潜修其道。 慎勿妄宣，宣示非人，考延子身，不但风刀，殃逮七玄。 明慎天科，以求道真，九年不懈，克得上仙。 诀文以九天丈人、三天玉童，同时传太帝君、天帝君、太微天帝君。 太帝君以传南极上元君，天帝君以传西王母，太微天帝君以传金阙圣君，金阙圣君传上相青童君，青童君传西城王君，使付后学应为真人者。 承真相统，气系皇篇，至王君已经七千余劫。 王君后封灵文於王屋山西穴玉室之内，有素灵之官侍香典文。 其道秘妙，不行於世，若有玄名遇得此文，万仙来朝，天官卫身，懃行苦思，白日升晨。 凡受上清道德三宝妙章，步虚升玄之道，而不先释五藏，开理幽关，万气不固，真灵不欣，徒劳懃事，万不得仙。 今撰玉诀，上帝妙言，以传后学，秘而奉真，慎勿轻传，殃灭子身。 每至本命之日，沐浴入室，东向叩齿九通，冥目思东方青帝少阳九灵真人，讳拘上生，身长九寸，头戴九元之冠，衣单青飞裙，手执青精玉板，乘青云飞舆，从十二青桂玉女，从天清阳宫中来下，以青云冠覆我身。 思九灵真人乘云气入我身中，安镇肝内，便三呼少阳九灵真人拘上生，赍青芝五精补养我身。 便三味口三咽止，仰咒曰： 苍元浩灵，少阳先生，九气还肝，使为魄宁，幽府结华，藏内鲜明，练容固体，反白为青，神化内发，景登紫庭，敢有犯试，摧以流铃，上帝玉录，太清记名。 毕，引气九咽止。 正南向，冥目叩齿三通，思南方赤帝太阳南极真人，讳融尚生，身长三寸，头戴进贤之冠，衣纬章之衣，手执朱玉之板，乘赤云飞舆，从赤桂玉女十二人，从天兰台宫中来下，以丹云飞舆冠覆我身。 思太阳南极真人乘云气入我身中，安镇心内，便三呼太阳南极真人融尚生，赍丹芝玉精补养我身，便三味口三咽，仰祝曰： 赤庭绛云，上有高真，三气归心，是我丹元，腾我净躬，径奏以闻，心固神静，九灵闭关，金真内映，紫烟结云，太微绿字，书名神仙，飞行上清，朝谒帝尊。 毕，引气三过咽止。 正西向，冥目叩齿七通，思西方白帝少阴素灵真人，讳辱明子，身长七寸，头戴玉宝玄冠，衣素锦之衣，手执素玉之板，乘白云飞舆，从素灵玉女十二人，从天皇堂宫来下，以素云冠覆我身。

**The Wondrous Scripture of the Three Nines and Jade Essence from the Supreme Cavern of Perfection**

**Scripture Title:** *The Wondrous Scripture of the Three Nines and Jade Essence from the Supreme Cavern of Perfection*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing tradition.

**The Wondrous Oral Formula of the Three Nines and Jade Essence**

On the auspicious celestial stem day of the first year of the *shangyuan* era, at the hour of the northern quadrant, when the Three Origins aligned in radiance and the Nine Emperors returned to perfection, the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One and the Three Heavens’ Jade Lads ascended the Jade Pavilion of the Lofty Heights, the Purple Void Heaven. There, the *Three Nines Oral Formula* was revealed, unlocking the numinous barrier, and the *Jade Essence True Formula* was bestowed—governing destiny for eternal preservation. Its revelation illuminated the distant expanse, its clarity as pure as the rustling wind, its jade tones resounding through the void, its jasper melodies soaring beyond the heavens. Fragrant winds stirred without cease, and wisdom’s chant echoed into the farthest reaches. Its fragrance suffused the depths of the visage, its qi outstripped the divine gales. The Jade Tablet commanded all, and the myriad immortals came to pay homage. This was the wondrous transformation of primordial mystery, enduring through ten thousand kalpas without decay. The true formula was recorded to bequeath to the worthy, testing the sincerity of those who seek with diligence.

Should one’s golden name be *Eastern Radiance* and one’s verdant appellation *Purple Court*, upon receiving this wondrous scripture, one ascends to the Jade Clarity Heaven. The Three Passes unlock their mechanism, the Nine Portals receive the numinous, and the visage assumes a golden countenance. The Five Viscera flourish in splendor, the golden perfection is felt in harmony, and the boundless is illuminated with clarity. The divine candle shines in hidden radiance, the treasure-light is born in the night. Molten gold is cast in exchange, and the flaming bells blaze forth. With a whistle, the command is instantly fulfilled, and the divine soldiers are marshaled. The Three Origins journey to the chamber, descending in a jade-green chariot. Riding the void, soaring through emptiness, one ascends to the Supreme Clarity.

The Most Exalted Azure Lad said: The *Three Nines Oral Formula* originates from the incantations of the Nine Emperors and the Three Perfected, governing qi to prolong the years and unlocking the numinous barrier to freshen the Five Viscera.

You possess jade bones and have beheld this text. Receive it in secret, swear a luminous oath, and pledge your faith to the Nine Heavens. Cultivate this Dao in seclusion. Guard against reckless transmission; to reveal it to the unworthy is to invite calamity upon yourself—not merely the wind’s blade, but misfortune extending to the Seven Mysteries. Be vigilant in celestial law, seeking the true Dao. After nine years of unwavering practice, you shall attain the rank of Supreme Immortal.

The formula was transmitted simultaneously by the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One and the Three Heavens’ Jade Lads to the Supreme Thearch, the Celestial Thearch, and the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity. The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Lord of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen; the Celestial Thearch transmitted it to the Queen Mother of the West; the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Sacred Lord of the Golden Portal. The Sacred Lord of the Golden Portal transmitted it to the Most Exalted Azure Lad, who in turn transmitted it to the Lord of the Western City, entrusting it to later disciples destined to become Perfected. The lineage of transmission, bound by true qi, traces back to the imperial scripture. By the time of the Lord of the Western City, over seven thousand kalpas had passed. Thereafter, the Lord of the Western City sealed the numinous text within the jade chamber of the western cavern of Mount Wangwu, where the officials of the Plain Spirit attended to its incense and guarded its scripture.

This Dao is profoundly wondrous and not disseminated in the world. Should one of mysterious destiny encounter this text, the myriad immortals shall come to pay homage, and celestial officials shall guard one’s person. Through diligent practice and arduous contemplation, one shall ascend at dawn.

For those who receive the wondrous chapters of the Three Treasures of the Supreme Clarity’s Dao and Virtue, practicing the Way of pacing the void to ascend the mystery, yet do not first release the Five Viscera and open the hidden barriers, their myriad qi will not be stabilized, and their true numen will not rejoice. Their diligent efforts shall be in vain, and they shall never attain immortality.

Now, this *Jade Formula*, the wondrous words of the Supreme Thearch, is transmitted to later disciples. Guard it in secrecy and revere the true. Beware of careless transmission, lest calamity befall you.

On the day of your life-destiny, bathe and enter the chamber. Face east, knock your teeth nine times, and with eyes closed, visualize the Nine Numinous Perfected of the Eastern Azure Thearch and Lesser Yang, whose taboo name is *Jushangsheng*. He is nine inches tall, wears a Nine Origins crown, and is clad in a single-layered azure flying skirt. In his hand, he holds a jade tablet of azure essence, riding a flying chariot of azure clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Azure Cassia. They descend from the Palace of Celestial Clarity and Yang. Visualize the azure cloud crown covering your body.

Imagine the Nine Numinous Perfected riding the cloud-qi into your body, settling and stabilizing your liver. Then, call thrice upon the Nine Numinous Perfected of Lesser Yang, *Jushangsheng*, beseeching him to bestow the five essences of azure mushrooms to nourish your body. Then, taste thrice and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Vast and numinous Azure Origin, Master of Lesser Yang,
Nine qi return to the liver, pacifying the po soul.
The hidden palace knots in splendor, the viscera’s interior gleams bright.
Refine the countenance, strengthen the body, reverse white to azure.
The divine transformation arises within, the radiance ascends to the Purple Court.
Should any dare transgress, be shattered by the flaming bells.
Inscribed in the Jade Record of the Supreme Thearch, the name is recorded in the Grand Clarity."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing nine times.

Face due south, close your eyes, and knock your teeth three times. Visualize the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang of the Southern Crimson Thearch, whose taboo name is *Rongshangsheng*. He is three inches tall, wears a *Jinxian* crown, and is clad in a robe of woven patterns. In his hand, he holds a vermilion jade tablet, riding a flying chariot of crimson clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Crimson Cassia. They descend from the Palace of the Orchid Terrace. Visualize the crimson cloud chariot covering your body.

Imagine the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang riding the cloud-qi into your body, settling and stabilizing your heart. Then, call thrice upon the Perfected of the Southern Culmen and Greater Yang, *Rongshangsheng*, beseeching him to bestow the jade essence of cinnabar mushrooms to nourish your body. Then, taste thrice and swallow three times. Look upward and recite the incantation:

*"Crimson Court of scarlet clouds, above dwell the exalted Perfected.
Three qi return to the heart, this is my cinnabar origin.
Exalt my pure body, ascend directly to make report.
The heart is stabilized, the spirit is tranquil, the Nine Numinous seal the barrier.
Golden perfection shines within, purple mist knots into clouds.
Inscribed in the verdant script of the Grand Tenuity, the name is written as divine immortal.
Soaring to the Supreme Clarity, I pay homage to the Imperial Honored One."*

Conclude by drawing in qi and swallowing three times.

Face due west, close your eyes, and knock your teeth seven times. Visualize the Plain Numinous Perfected of the Western White Thearch and Lesser Yin, whose taboo name is *Rumingzi*. He is seven inches tall, wears a dark jade crown, and is clad in a robe of plain brocade. In his hand, he holds a plain jade tablet, riding a flying chariot of white clouds, accompanied by twelve Jade Maidens of the Plain Spirit. They descend from the Palace of the Celestial August Hall. Visualize the plain cloud crown covering your body.

Prime Origin Thearch’s numen.

Body to pay homage in the Purple Court.
